name: v0.13.1
body:
### 0.13.1 (Mar 21, 2021)
- Bunch of translations, thank you all!
- Russian added/updated by: Vlad & Andrey F
- German updated by: Maximilian H, Translator & Simon Kreuzer
- French updated by: Aearil
- Polish updated by: Atrate & Jakub Fabijan
- Spanish updated by: badlop & Vi-dot1
- Hungarian added by: SoftwareByRedline
- Turkish added by: Burak Hüseyin Ekseli

```
sha256sum app-release.apk
11eca17814b011b601153b105e9a12f70d906e0e99d6ccf2f13c5e2300fdcccc 
```

name: v0.13.0

### 0.13.0 (Dec 1, 2020)
- Polish translation added by WaldiS.
- French translation added by J. Lavoie.
- Norwegian translation updated by Allan Nordhøy.
- German translation updated by Simon Kreuzer and J. Lavoie.
- Thank you!

sha256sum app-release.apk
4288ffaf36ca39ed9df4b350284ead01ce7a3793cf49243aa2e7327268235889

name: v0.12.0
body:
### 0.12.0 (Mar 25, 2020)
- Add location permissions for Android 10. Android 10 requires fine instead of coarse location
permission to access the WiFi SSID. And it need it 'all the time' to be able to use
SSID whitelist while AN2Linux is running in background.

```
sha256sum app-release.apk
13743ee35fd8895bf92a1c36fc030e979c988ab06ffa46441bc05bf294eb7224 
```

name: v0.11.0
body:

name: v0.10.0
body:
### 0.10.0 (Oct 9, 2019)
- Add support for commas in WiFi SSID

```
sha256sum app-release.apk
5007621ff5a3e035bc357a25be413ea2c8e24d1dbba38adcd17a21ab4663e457 
```

### 0.9.2 (Sep 4, 2019)
- Add information about battery optimizations (Doze) introduced in Android 6.0.
- Fix for previous release

```
sha256sum app-release.apk
ad65684bb6cd6dbbd5838d19786b1fe525a806a022aacc2a54c1e2999ebd0c31  app-release.apk
```

### 0.9.1 (Sep 4, 2019)
- Add information about battery optimizations (Doze) introduced in Android 6.0.

```
sha256sum app-release.apk
5890e5ec683827ee686a768005c7ddcd766bf4eec9216abb964617f6b1702685  app-release.apk
```

### 0.9.0 (Sep 1, 2019)
- Add support for filtering apps with text search in 'Enabled applications' settings.

- Add quick settings tile for toggle enable/disable AN2Linux.

- Change minimum version required from Android 4.4 (API 19) to Android 4.3 (API 18).

- New setting: don't send notification if phone display is turned on.

```
sha256sum app-release.apk 
60e03f9d5c02d1c3731fbe3edf6af24da0aa52698c0a93ab58266e35a6c87872  app-release.apk
```

### 0.8.1 (Feb 26, 2019)
- Fix build bug which is stopping F-Droid, now disable error on lint. Thank you edaubert!
- German translation by Luensche, thank you!

### 0.8.0 (May 26, 2018)
- From Android 8.1 COARSE_LOCATION permission is needed to access WiFi SSID! Also it seems
that location services needs to be turned on as well, otherwise the SSID reported will
be "unknown ssid".

- Setting to run AN2Linux as a foreground service, thank you Eyenseo!

- Dutch translation by Vistaus, thank you!

- Spanish translation by CalebCDE, thank you!

```
sha256sum app-release.apk
68e1c9c37e2de5f63ef2e1067fb7156433ddabfb506bde3dbedfc45472694804  app-release.apk
```

### 0.7.0 (Jan 16, 2018)
- New icon created by conrad-heimbold@github, thank you!

```
sha256sum app-release.apk
695d63bc145c860cdeefa89883c1e92f163224c93ccfc9076e8dbbc0d26996fd
```

### 0.6.0 (May 12, 2017)
- New preference added for minimum notification priority

```
sha256sum app-release.apk
a8360ce0ef5c8445af692781d8e1a7c2bbad02aae3045f3be07b43587855638c
```

### 0.5.1 (Apr 12, 2017)
- Fix bug that caused AN2Linux to crash when opening individual app settings (affecting Android 4.4-5.1)

### 0.4.0 (Apr 1, 2017)
- Allow notification settings to be set individually per app

### 0.3.0 (Feb 6, 2017)
- New preference added for custom icon size

### 0.2.0 (Jan 9, 2017)
- New preference added for Android 5.0+ Lollipop users: "Block local notifications"

### 0.1.1 (Jan 7, 2017)
- Fix bug that made AN2Linux unusable for Android 4.4 KitKat users (using ciphers not supported until 5.0)
